subtitle: These easy to make chicken wings are great for a light summer supper served with new potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

method.text: Trim the chicken wings. Season the flour and place into a large, clean polythene bag. Add the chicken wings and shake well.
Dip the wings in the beaten egg, then the sesame seeds, and place on a baking tray.
Bake for 15-20 min until pale golden brown and cooked through.
Sprinkle with paprika, or chilli powder, and parsley. Serve immediately.

title: Crunchy chicken wings
